TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Zayazayan, title = Zayazayan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zayazayan} }

S.FORM: == Zayazayan == u sulit nu Hulam: : u siwkay nu niyazu' i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Zayazayan. u kasalumaluma' nu Zayazayan sa, 233 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 793 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 768 ku tademaw, pakalatu 97%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 25 ku tademaw, pakalatu 3%. u asip nu cidekay a tademaw u kasabinacadan, Paywan(Paiwan) 89%, Rukay(Rukai) 3%, Tayan(Tayal) 1%, Pangcah(Amis) 1%, Yuwatan(Bunun) 1%, zumazuma 2%. u niyazu' nu Paywan u Paywan a niyazu' kuyni. tuud ku Paywan a tademaw itiniay a niyazu'. u Sakizaya a tademaw inayay ku Sakizaya itini. u zuma a tademaw sa u Rukay(Rukai) u Tayan(Tayal) u Pangcah(Amis) atu Yuwatan. u cidekay nu Taywan a Incumin: u Sakizaya a binacadan azihan i u Pangcah(Amis) a binacadan azihan i u Tayal a binacadan azihan i u Paywan a binacadan azihan i u Bunun a binacadan azihan i u Piyuma a binacadan azihan i u Rukay a binacadan azihan i u Takuku a binacadan azihan i u Sejek a binacadan azihan i u Saysia a binacadan azihan i u Kabalan a binacadan azihan i u Kanakanabu a binacadan azihan i u Laaluwa a binacadan azihan i u Saw a binacadan azihan i u Chou a binacadan azihan i u Tau a binacadan azihan i

== Zayazayan == o solit no Holam: : o siwkay no niyazo' i Pingtong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Zayazayan. o kasalomaloma' no Zayazayan sa, 233 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 793 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 768 ko tademaw, pakalato 97%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 25 ko tademaw, pakalato 3%. o asip no cidekay a tademaw o kasabinacadan, Paywan(Paiwan) 89%, Rokay(Rokai) 3%, Tayan(Tayal) 1%, Pangcah(Amis) 1%, Yowatan(Bonon) 1%, zomazoma 2%. o niyazo' no Paywan o Paywan a niyazo' koyni. tood ko Paywan a tademaw itiniay a niyazo'. o Sakizaya a tademaw inayay ko Sakizaya itini. o zoma a tademaw sa o Rokay(Rokai) o Tayan(Tayal) o Pangcah(Amis) ato Yowatan. o cidekay no Taywan a Incomin: o Sakizaya a binacadan azihan i o Pangcah(Amis) a binacadan azihan i o Tayal a binacadan azihan i o Paywan a binacadan azihan i o Bonon a binacadan azihan i o Piyoma a binacadan azihan i o Rokay a binacadan azihan i o Takoko a binacadan azihan i o Sejek a binacadan azihan i o Saysia a binacadan azihan i o Kabalan a binacadan azihan i o Kanakanabo a binacadan azihan i o Laalowa a binacadan azihan i o Saw a binacadan azihan i o Choo a binacadan azihan i o Tao a binacadan azihan i
